content.name: Capital Ships Interdict
content.description:
L and XL fighting ships halt travel drives of hostile ships in local space
Performance Impact: Mid - this is a fairly script-heavy clobber approach to accomplishing the feature
Intention:
Military fleets are now forced now engage each other instead of fast-traveling past. Fighters no longer engage travel drive and ram into things during combat with large targets.
Secondary Effects:
It's much harder to get through hostile sectors now. Trade and mining ships will absolutely get destroyed in greater numbers as they path into hostile interdiction range.
For modders: source: https://github.com/nathansmith11170/X4-mods
content.author: General Vash
